news.title: Musk hails $16.5bn Samsung deal to supply Tesla with AI chips
news.summary: South Korean tech company will produce carmaker’s next-generation semiconductors at new plant in Texas.

news.title: Meet the new James Bond: how 007 First Light earned its licence to thrill
news.summary: First Light is an origin story intended to define one of the most durable protagonists in entertainment for a new generation of game-literate fans. As developed by Danish studio IO Interactive for next year’s 007 First Light, the new Bond is blandly handsome in a doll-like way.
